name: Lost Melody

weaponEffects.title: Volt resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase volt ATK by **20%** and volt resistance by **40%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more volt weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot. Effect does not stack with Volt Resonance.

advancements: After **Echo** is triggered, each crystal thorn will deal damage equal to **193.3%** of ATK to nearby targets every **2** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
Release any weapon or discharge skill, generate **1** crystal thorn.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.
The healing crystal thorns receive from **Echo** is increased to 50%.
After successfully releasing **Hella's Embrace**, volt damage is increased by **20%** for **30** seconds.

abilities.name: Wingspan
abilities.description: When on the ground, press normal attack to perform five consecutive attacks.
breakdown: **439.6%** of ATK + **23**, small knockback and alert nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Suppress
abilities.description: While airborne, press normal attack to attack 5 times in the air while consuming endurance.

abilities.name: Chase
abilities.description: After a normal attack on the ground, press and hold normal attack to trigger chase, dealing damage equal to **294%** of ATK + **15**.

abilities.name: Advent
abilities.description: Press and hold normal attack while in the air (only when an enemy is targeted) to trigger Advent. Fall from the sky and consume stamina, dealing damage equal to **380%** of ATK + **20** upon landing.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger a Phantasia, cooldown 15 seconds, reducing the speed of enemies within an area. Become immune to hitstun for **0.5** seconds while dodging.

abilities.name: Raid
abilities.description:
Short after moving and dodging, press normal attack to trigger Raid, dealing **159.6%** of ATK + **8** damage to nearby targets, and floating them.
Releasing this skill can trigger **Echo**.

abilities.name: Bee colony
abilities.description:
Short after dodging backwards, press normal attack to trigger Bee Colony and summon two. Bees deal **252%** of ATK + **13** damage to the target in front.
Releasing this skill can trigger **Echo**.

abilities.name: Shuttle
abilities.description: Press and hold dodge while on the ground to trigger Shuttle, flying high up. (unavailable when jetpack is disabled)

abilities.name: Suppression
abilities.description:
Press and hold dodge while moving on the ground to trigger Suppression, sending forward the hive spirit, and turn the grayspace enemy hit into an ally (not effective for bosses) for **60** seconds.
Release the hive spirit again, or when Suppression ends, the control state ends, and the target will take 45% of all damage dealt by itself during the control period.
Hive spirit can be blocked by non-grayspace enemies and does not take effect on them.

abilities.name: Field
abilities.description:
Perform **10** high-speed traversals, adsorb nearby targets and deal damage to nearby enemies equal to **867.4%** of ATK + **46**, deal an additional **462.6%** of ATK + **24** after landing.
Cooldown: **30** seconds.
Each movement, 10% of the maximum health of all the crystal thorns on the field is consumed, causing additional damage equal to (**Number of crystal thorns on the field** * **175%** of ATK , or **number of crystal thorns on the field** * **2.8%** of max HP. (take the highest value), until the crystal thorns Health is **0**.
The proportion of the maximum health loss of crystal thorns is regarded as the proportion of its own maximum health loss.

abilities.name: Harrah's Embrace
abilities.description:
When the ***weapon is fully charged*** or ***Phantasia*** is triggered, switch from another weapon to this weapon to **remove all debuffs from the user**, and Summon Hella's Embrace that deals damage equal to **1,650%** of ATK + **87** to nearby targets. Gain immunity for **2.6** seconds during the period (does not take effect in Apex League).
After successfully releasing Hella's Embrace, volt damage is increased by **25%** for **30** seconds. After Hella's embrace hits, **3** crystal thorns are generated (up to **5** can exist on the field). Each thorn initially has **100%** of the wielder's max HP. Cannot be attacked, and only receives healing from Echo. Lasts for **150** seconds. Additionally, get **2** Echos (up to **4**). Any dodge attack consumes **1** echo each time, dealing damage equal to (**Amount of crystal thorns on the field** * **240%** of ATK, heal all crystal thorns by **25%** of their max HP. Reset the position of the crystal thorn and its duration. Get a chance to dodge once without consuming a dodge attempt.

recommendedMatrices.name: Rubilia
recommendedMatrices.description: Both Rubilia's 2-piece and 4-piece set could be good on Rubilia herself, but because it also works in the off-hand slot, it should be placed on the sub dps/support weapon.

recommendedMatrices.name: Shiro
recommendedMatrices.description: Great set effects for both shatter and consistent damage increase. Use 4 set for quick fights, otherwise pair with 2-set Samir or 2-set Crow.

recommendedMatrices.name: Crow
recommendedMatrices.description: At high crit rate, Crow's 2 set is the second best choice for damage.

recommendedMatrices.name: Samir
recommendedMatrices.description: Because of the quick and frequent attacks, Lost Melody can easily maintain 100% uptime on the buff.

recommendedMatrices.name: Sobek
recommendedMatrices.description: A good substitute for SSR damage chips if you don't have them. Very useful against groups of mobs, i.e. in Bygone Phantasm.
